entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -19.7°C
Wind: SSE 19 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
